Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Amir Gal "Neil G."
Reviews.Content: Pros:  Takes good pictures in full sun light.  Very impressive HD video. easy to use on screen menu.I took some pictures out door in day light using the cameras' automatic setting, the pictures came out in good quality. In addition I tried the video and the result was impressive.Cons:  Does not work very well in low light environment with the cameras' automatic setting. However, I found that it can take pretty good pictures when I used the manual setting, which I found very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a super price!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I looked around for a nice digital camera in the ballpark of $100.  I was about to get the Olympus fe when I found this camera.  I've used it for a couple of days now and have found it to be very intuitive and fun to use.  Ease of use of a digital camera is an important feature for me and this camera stacks up in every way.  The HD video camera is a great feature as well.  So far we have been very impressed with the quality of the pictures that our new camera takes.I would recommend this as a great point and shoot digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Olympus VG-120
Reviews.Author: Monte R. Hawk
Reviews.Content: Camera is small and I can put it in my shirt pocket.  Pictures taken with flash are great.  Pictures taken outside are excellent, but if I am in the shade taking a picture, everything in the sun is washed out.  I'm still trying to figure out what needs to be done to stop that.  The HD Movie part is disappointing.  Bought the camera from Amazon.  As usual, they delivered in record time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: kitkat11
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks my socks! I love it, it looks awesome with its black, sexy, chicness. It has awesome effects like punk, fish-eye, panorama etc. It takes clear pictures inside and out with effects like indoor, sunset, fireworks, cuisine, night, sport, and landscape. It feels light but also feels durable. It comes with the cables that you can hook it up to your TV and see the pictures on your camera on your TV, and videos...that is really cool! It is easy to learn how to use it. The sound and picture on the videos is clear. This is just a really good camera and its my third digital camera and it is my best so far. If you are looking to buy this one, you should. When I was looking to buy one, I researched a lot, and I mean a lot, and then I found this one and am so glad that I bought it. I love it! And I know you will too :D

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Martz
Reviews.Content: This camera was a Christmas present for my son. Its a great starter camera, easy to use, tough and water proof. Camera is easy to use because there are only a few buttons on back of camera to worry about. Only thing needed is a memory card.

Reviews.Title: I really Wanted to Like this Camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn May
Reviews.Content: It's a simple, easy camera to use, but there is no "real"Image Stabilization in this camera.They boost the ISO and open the Aperture for a faster shutter speed,but this is not very effective and I found that 2 out of 3 images wereslightly out of focus.Even when I made certain I got the lighted green focus boxon the LCD saying that it was in focus the images were still blurred.I know other reviewers have had better luck, so this may be user shake, orthe particular camera that I received, but if you want to take a quick shotbe aware there is NO IMAGE STABILIZATION in this camera and that makesquite a difference especially when you zoom all the way in for close ups.It's almost impossible to keep a camera this light and small still.I returned mine to Amazon.  They are great about returns, so I tend tobuy almost exclusively from them on line.If you can afford it spend a bit more and get a P&S; camera with a LOT ofgood ratings with actual image stabilization.

Reviews.Title: Big punch for little package
Reviews.Author: KOMAR
Reviews.Content: I researched many cameras for a replacement for my aging and bulky Sony digital camera.  I was looking for features comparable to my Sony as I didn't want to downgrade.  I found this camera to be rich with features and a few that others didn't have.Size was a big factor and this does not let down.I would buy over and over, highly recommended.Only thing that held back for full 5 stars is the physical location of the flash.  I find it is located too close to action button and seem to have a lot of fingers in the way.  After a few weeks I got used to holding the camera in a way to overcome this.FOLLOW UP 12/15/2012Camera is still going stron even after a few drops by my 4 yr old daughter.  The lens does have a retracting issue every now and then most likely from the drop.  Still takes great pictures and is pretty good on the tri-pod as well.

Reviews.Title: camera olimpus
Reviews.Author: jhon
Reviews.Content: this product was very good !!! very good condition, all funtion are working good, the product is 100 % new,

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: MsChe7
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this camera, the picture quality was not the greatest. Some of my pictures were very blurry or not focus at all. I tried messing with the settings but it was always set to auto focus. Another issue I had with the camera was that it would never connect to the computer. I tried different cables and USB ports without any luck. I wanted to wait longer before I return it to give it another chance but when I used it to record my daughter's first performance it recorded everything except my daughters performance. When I tried playing back the video on the camera it would just say file error. The last thing I didn't like from the camera was the fact that I couldn't zoom in or out while recording.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly "Quako"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who needed a new camera. I have a less expensive model which my company bought me for work.  She has only very positive things to say about the camera.  It does not suffer from the "lag time syndrome" of a lot of inexpensive point and shot cameras.  She has been able to take some wonderful photos of my grandson.  How well it will hold up is something only time will tell. I will comment later after the camera is six months old. This was not an expensive camera, but appears to give you a good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Josh K
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my parents, they aren't the most tech savvy but it was easy to use out of the box. Camera takes fairly decent pictures, nothing to complain about. Olympus is continuing to serve us well. Would highly recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: I like it....good camera easy to use
Reviews.Author: Vera
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mom.. this camera has couple of languages that my mom can understand and she loved it.I might buy for myself too.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: TheRahmans
Reviews.Content: I got the Olympus VG-120 for Christmas... It's clean, really nice and comes with it's charger E.T.C. There's something on it called magic (Effects) that's cool to. It turns on with that little music tune, The video is ok not great... but I don't mind just so long as I have a camera really. Great thing!It's up for a pretty good price. THe zoom in is good,you can review your pictures. I strongly recomend thins camera!!!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: Drea
Reviews.Content: The price of this product and how clear and amazing the pictures look made me sooo happy!! This camera is not even for me but to be completely honest I really want one now. Its better than my nikon i absolutely love it!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: Mafalda Quinn
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I liked the idea that could take panorama. Alas, it has to be done with the software,  not in- camera. But takes excellent indoor pictures without flash, and that is  certainly a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Lala Lucy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera - very lightweight and small enough to fit in my jacket pocket. I purchased this to use on a construction site, and am very pleased with the results so far. Doesn't seem like you can get a better deal!

Reviews.Title: Results in blurred images and didnot expect this
Reviews.Author: Praveen N
Reviews.Content: I have seen one of my friend using Olympus (not sure about the model number), so decided to buy this make.But I have lately opened the box and realized that the camera is resulting in blurred images.. by the time I wanted to return it was late and I was helpless..Not sure if the one I received was defective but I stopped using this and just taking pics from my iphone for now..Not a good buy..

Reviews.Title: Not Quality
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Olympus VG-120 did not operate to the expectation I had based on the technical specifications.  I compared models of similar tech specs and chose the Olympus based on being less expensive than other models.  Pictures are fuzzy; even the motion sensitive mode to help stabilize the pictures doesn't work well.  I recommend shopping for a different model or different brand.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes good, Sometimes Blurry
Reviews.Author: Just a thought
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is hit and miss. You havve to be perfectly still or it will blur. I got this for a gift, but I think hat it will be upgraded to something better shortly.  I was hoping this would have been an upgrade from the Kodak Easyshare I got him more than 5 years ago, it really wasn't. It is capable of good pictures though.

Reviews.Title: Great for a "take everywhere, do anything, and not worry about the cost of it" camera
Reviews.Author: Z. Pendleton
Reviews.Content: Hey, for $79.98 this is a great no worries camera. Yeah, the casing feels a little cheap, it's lacks the heft of more quality cameras, but when you just want a small point and shoot to capture the random things that happen in life, this suffices. Like other reviews said, it does struggle with certain lighting situations. Also, you have to play with the settings a bit to ensure that pictures are in focus, but, it just depends what the scenario of the shot it. Most of the time it does great just on the automatic setting. It has some fun settings too, for those who are fans of "Instagram" and other smart phone image editing apps, you might like the magic setting on this little camera, Seni Pop, Pinhole, Fish-eye, Sketch, just to name a few. It also has a panoramic setting, not the "hold the shutter, and pan" kind but, take up to three pictures in that mode and it stitches them together for you. Seems to work fine.In a nutshell, it's not a professional camera, but I assume if you are even considering this, that's not what you are looking for anyway. Inexpensive, and has a dedicated video record button. Doesn't perform as well in all types of shots as did my last camera (A Canon PowerShot A3100) But For the price, it does just dandy.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: K. Allen
Reviews.Content: I love this little cam. It takes pics better than my old JVC and I like that its rechargeable. I recommend this one for anybody who just needs a simple, good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: SusieQ
Reviews.Content: Just the size camera I needed.  Very easy to use and takes great pictures. The color is great. I needed a small camera to take with me in case that great picture comes along.

Reviews.Title: a tool
Reviews.Author: pbehan
Reviews.Content: this camera was bought for our local Humane Society every animal that comes in is photographed and they are all placed online and a small picture is placed in their file. This camera is handled by many people and seems to hold up very well, also I am told that the camera is used in different fund raisers such as pictures with Santa clause pictures with the Easter Bunny, and our local fair.thank you Amazon for making our Dollar go a little further

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: MonicaBrown
Reviews.Content: Great camera easy to use takes great pics my 10 year old daughter loves it! It is better than my camera I would by for myself also.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - very large screen
Reviews.Author: tra namloc "trAnamloC"
Reviews.Content: My somewhat technophobic wife (love you, honey!) was quickly able to get up to speed. As an experienced photographer I was able to use the macro features.

Reviews.Title: Just OK. Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This was a sub $100 camera, and it sort of feels that way. Picture quality seems OK. At times the picture seems grainy, but that may just be the LCD repsentation on the camera. I am glad we made this purchase because we've gone through a lot of cameras. This one works as an easy to carry, worry free camera.

Reviews.Title: Olyimpus Camera VG 160 purchased through Amazon
Reviews.Author: E. Huggins
Reviews.Content: It takes beautiful pictures, but for  a very senior citizen it is a fully packed computer.  It takes a lot of patient reading and testing.It is working well, but I expected something a little less complicataed. Eileen

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Capcyclone
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for work purposes.Pros:  Good picture quality (14MP)  Simple and fairly pricedCons:  A bit slow between pictures  Not very sturdyAfter purchasing and using this camera for a short time, I am convinced there are better options out there.  I rated this 4 stars because it functions well and does everything it should in a capable fashion, but from personal experience I know there are better options out there at this price point (Panasonic's Lumix models for example).I've been impressed with Olympus digital cameras in the past, but this is one model that I anticipate will be gone soon.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Manuel D.
Reviews.Content: High quality product in perfect condition, between the teams of this type this is one of the best, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Beltran
Reviews.Content: The camera works great but we never got a cable to be able to charge it so I was a little disappointed

Reviews.Title: OK!!
Reviews.Author: 954clive04
Reviews.Content: I messed up my samsung and decided to try something different. Wrong!! I should have bought another samsung. The olympus is ok but at times the picture is not focused and worse from distances, You have to pay more attention on keeping still than taking the pic.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and video love all the different settings and easy to use and for the price people are impressed thought i paid more for it !!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Joan Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: thanks for sale I look forward to buying them a hug soon and Merry Christmas and prosperous New Year 2013

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera at a great price.
Reviews.Author: EJR
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife.  She loves the camera.  I still use an older Olympus.  The only shortcoming the new camera has is that it doesn't appear to be as well built as the older one, more plastic and such.  The pictures are as good or better than the earlier model.

Reviews.Title: Good vlogging camera
Reviews.Author: Gia Morre
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for daily vlogging and making skits on Youtube. The microphone is pretty decent. The speakers could be a bit nicer, but overall it's a nice camera. I would definitely recommend this camera to all my vlogger friends!It doesn't have that "plastic" feel to it either. The battery life is good, and the camera is small enough to fit in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: olympus vg-120
Reviews.Author: FELIX LO
Reviews.Content: This is the second compact Olympus camera I bought in the last 3 years. Unfortunately, I will not be buying another Olympus camera. The last one, VG-120 died after having it for about 10 months. The power indicator light will come on for a couple of seconds-blinking lights and then shut off completely. At first, I thought it was the battery so I bought another battery, had it fully charged and the same problem happened. Also, not to mentioned that I lost all my pictures I took on our family vacation in Hawaii 2 weeks ago. The previous Olympus camera I had a different problem. The lens did not retract after turning the power off. Again, I tried putting in a new fully charged battery- no luck.I am trying my luck with the Nikon S-6300. Should be receiving it soon.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera
Reviews.Author: Smart User
Reviews.Content: I misplaced my Casio EX-Z550, so I bought the Olympus VG-120 based on decent reviews.  The Olympus VG-120's auto focus always focuses on the wrong subject when using the Program Auto and iAuto (herein auto-everything mode), so your primary subject is often out of focus.  If you'd to take a person's picture, it would lock it's focus on something behind the person, or anywhere else but the subject; this refers to the auto-everything mode. I am very tech savvy, and I can figure most technical stuff out.  I've spent a bit of time playing with this camera, and no matter what I do, the auto-everything mode (both P, and iAuto) still take terrible pictures.  There are other options in the camera that will make it take better pictures, but takes more work; defeats the purpose of "point and shoot".The automatic white balance is also incorrect.  Pictures always come out on the "cool" side of the Kelvin scale (white pictures instead of warm).  Night time in door pictures are terrible.  It's vastly inferior to the Casio, and no I don't work for or have any stocks in Casio.Shortly after buying this camera, I found the Casio camera and shot the same pictures side by side with the Olympus. The Casio's pictures are better by a mile.  I will definitely be using the Casio over this one.  I don't like to return things so I will keep it, but this camera is a waste of money.  I've bought a few cameras over the years, including SLRs.  This is my first Olympus camera, and it is utterly disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Followed Instructions When Setting Up - Glitches!
Reviews.Author: R. Norris "bugnut"
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased at Amazon, July, 2012. Read the instructions before use. I did and there were still a few glitches. The charge light went off indicating it was fully charged but then when I unplugged it, it read "Do not unplug USB cable." So I would plug it back, the light would come on for about a minute and go off again (it did this about 5 times). It says in the instructions that after you turn it on, if the "P" (for program auto) isn't there to hit the < button and choose "P" on the function menu. (This "<" symbol is not on the camera.) Mine went directly to "slideshow" mode when I turned it on and I couldn't find the Function Menu. It never came up! I turned it off several times thinking it would reset and it would not. FINALLY, I turned it on and the "P" appeared on the Function Menu! Takes great pictures and relatively easy to use after the initial frustrations.

Reviews.Title: A really lousy purchase
Reviews.Author: scott s
Reviews.Content: I bought this last year and it's the worst camera I've ever owned. Nearly every single photo comes out blurry, no matter what mode or settings I use. I thought at this price, it was worth buying, but it turned out to be a complete waste of money. I'm now buying a better camera just one year later to make up for this mistake.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS DAMN CQMERA
Reviews.Author: Jay A. Walker "Jay Walker"
Reviews.Content: Battery that comes with TO BIG Sd card will not fit Piece of junk ".............l.  .... DO NOT BUY THIS DAMN CQMERA. DO NOT BUY THIS DAMN CQMERA.  DO NOT BUY THIS DAMN CQMERA

Reviews.Title: the seller sucks
Reviews.Author: PK
Reviews.Content: How come a $80 dollars camera pack with only newspaper. Could you pack with something antishock?? but the camera is good for daytime. not night

Reviews.Title: lo mejor en su precio
Reviews.Author: hermel
Reviews.Content: excelente camara, super rapido el disparo, muy buena calidad de fotografia, buenos modos de escena...en fin lo mejor que hay en su tipo para mi gusto...ademas que es de la casa numero uno...olympus

Reviews.Title: nice!but.....
Reviews.Author: PAMELA KOZAK
Reviews.Content: We havent really been able to play around with it much as the camera has memory for about 10 pictures without a memory card. I wish it would have said that in the reviews I read!

ProductInfo.Features:
720P HD Movie,14 Megapixels
14 megapixels (effective), 1/2.3 inch image sensor; 5x wide-angle optical zoom plus 4x digital zoom
3.0 inch LCD monitor; CCD Contrast Detection; One touch 720p HD movie with sound
Digital image stabilization; Intelligent Auto; AF Tracking; Face Detection
Shadow Adjustment technology; Magic Filter still and movie; Panorama mode,SDHC Compatible
USB 2.0 High-Speed; SD/SDHC compatible (card not included),5x Optical Zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus  VG-120  14 MP Digital Camera, 5X Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (26mm), 3" LCD,(Silver)
